issue.title: Clang-SNAPSHOT emits `-Wuninitialized-const-pointer` in `modules/musig/tests_impl.h`
issue.body:
In the "[x86_64: Linux (Debian stable) (int64, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, clang-snapshot)](https://github.com/hebasto/secp256k1/actions/runs/17187389353/job/48758326367#logs)" CI job:
```
make  all-am
make[1]: Entering directory '/home/runner/work/secp256k1/secp256k1'
  CC       src/bench-bench.o
  CC       src/libsecp256k1_la-secp256k1.lo
  CC       src/libsecp256k1_precomputed_la-precomputed_ecmult.lo
  CC       src/libsecp256k1_precomputed_la-precomputed_ecmult_gen.lo
  CC       src/bench_internal-bench_internal.o
  CC       src/bench_ecmult-bench_ecmult.o
  CC       src/noverify_tests-tests.o
In file included from src/tests.c:7447:
src/modules/musig/tests_impl.h:931:79: error: variable 'keypair' is uninitialized when passed as a const pointer argument here [-Werror,-Wuninitialized-const-pointer]
  931 |             CHECK(secp256k1_musig_partial_sign(CTX, &partial_sig, &secnonce, &keypair, &keyagg_cache, &session));
      |                                                                               ^~~~~~~
1 error generated.
make[1]: *** [Makefile:1412: src/noverify_tests-tests.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

The same error in other CI jobs:
- [x86_64: Linux (Debian stable) (-O1, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, clang-snapshot)](https://github.com/hebasto/secp256k1/actions/runs/17187389353/job/48758326440#logs)
- [ARM64: Linux (Debian stable, QEMU) (clang-snapshot --target=aarch64-linux-gnu)](https://github.com/hebasto/secp256k1/actions/runs/17187389353/job/48758326301#logs)
- ...
